name: XR Challenge Puzzle Game
description:
After a heavy night, you wake up in a mysterious facility. Can you manage to solve all the puzzles and escape?

The game is difficult. Sometimes, even if you have the right idea, you may not always succeed at executing it. Read the narrative - there are a bunch of hints included. Here are a few hints if you get stuck (accordingly to floor numbers):

  1. Try ALL the buttons and check if any of them open the door. Be quick.
  2. Utilise dashing to its full potential. Dashing + crouching is also an option.
  3. Look around to find something that looks suspicious. Adhere to the input clues displayed on the wall.
  4. Remain silent in the library. The guards are blind.
  5.  Getting stuck in the lift is painful for AI too. This guy is not blind.

You can also sprint when SHIFT/R2/RT is held - it is not mentioned in the controls.

Time spent ~15 days.

For more information about the challenge and its rules, please see https://github.com/XRGames/xr-challenge.
